short_summary: Contaminated sites characterization in BC and YT CTA
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================

**Tender Reference:** WS3719279727
**Title:** Contaminated Sites Characterization BC and YT
**Published Date:** 02 January 2023

**Closing Date:** 15 February 2023 @ 14:00 ET

**Background:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the characterization of contaminated sites in British Columbia and the Yukon.

**Scope:**

The scope of work involves characterizing contaminated sites in the provinces of British Columbia and the Yukon, with an expected completion date of 31 January 2026.

**Type of Procurement:**

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP), with a Competitive - Open Bidding method.

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection criteria will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Regions of Delivery:**

The work will be delivered in the following regions:

* Canada
* British Columbia
* Yukon

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with an address of:

11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
Canada

**Contact Information:**

For information regarding this tender, please contact Hilda Lee (SPAC/PSPC) at:

hilda.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice:**

This notice is posted at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15018895?extsite=MTUwMTg4OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (English) and http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15018895?extsite=MTUwMTg4OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (French).

**Attachments:**

No attachments are available for this tender. 

**Tender Description:**

No tender description is provided. 
**Technical Details:**
- **UNSPC Code:** 77000000
